item.title: Coldwater Rumble 100 miler in the morning. I like a fresh pair shoes for every ultramarathon. I put a couple miles on them just to make sure the laces are okay. Then I destroy them. It gets expensive. Smile, or you're doing it wrong.
item.description: Coldwater Rumble 100 miler in the morning. I like a fresh pair shoes for every ultramarathon. I put a couple miles on them just to make sure the laces are okay. Then I destroy them. It gets expensive. Smile, or you're doing it wrong.

item.title: Back to Coldwater Rumble for year six. The math so far: 4 finishes, 1 DNF, and countless memories on these desert trails. Been a minute since I've played the long game, and honestly? These pre-race butterflies feel more like condors. But that's the sweet

item.title: Coldwater Rumble 100 miler starts at 7am in Goodyear, Arizona. When I finish on Sunday, TikTok will be no longer. thanks for all the support. #runtok #ultrarunner #coldwaterrumble
item.description: Coldwater Rumble 100 miler starts at 7am in Goodyear, Arizona. When I finish on Sunday, TikTok will be no longer. thanks for all the support. #runtok #ultrarunner #coldwaterrumble

item.title: I started running and TikTok was working. Around 60 miles they banned it. Then around mile 95 they brought it back. I finished running and everything was normal again. smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #ultrarunner
item.description: I started running and TikTok was working. Around 60 miles they banned it. Then around mile 95 they brought it back. I finished running and everything was normal again. smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #ultrarunner

item.title: Running over 100 miles per week for 255 straight weeks has been one of the hardest things I've ever done. This week as another fire starts in California I'll be working 120 hours, I'm super sick with a fever and am still recovering from my 100 miler on S

item.title: Dad fail. It would have been epic running the @lamarathon with him, but I guess we will wait 2 more years. Seems most marathons the age limit is 18. Who knew. Obviously not me. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #marathontraining #dadfail

item.title: Run through Redlands 1/2 marathon Sunday's forecast: - Wet shoes - Soaked everything - My son questioning his life choices - Me pretending I had no idea First rainy race memories coming up! Sometimes the best race stories come from the worst conditions.

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
